title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Chemistry Concept Mapping Proficiency Enhancement Program: Feedback Type

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry concepts and professional fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can create concept maps visualizing connections between chemistry concepts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can derive at least three strategies for improving concept maps based on feedback conditions (immediate/delayed/none).
Learners can enhance long-term retention of chemistry knowledge by over 30% through concept map quality assessments.
Learners can develop at least two cases of knowledge transfer, applying chemistry principles to other domains (e.g., language/technology).
Learners can systematically operate a process for sharing and providing feedback on concept maps with peers using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
